memorableMoments.message: My eyes got to see the most beautiful girl in the human kind for the very first time.
I Got to know her name from the front page of her notebook, Aasmi Surya.
I decided to talk to Aasmi after 2 months and 20 days, because i finally realised what I did to her and how much she had to suffer because of me.

The best day of my life. I unexpectdly propose Aasmi while walking outside "The Youth Library 2.0" and after having a lot of discussion she accepted my proposal and we were finally dating each other which was none less than a dream.
